name: Active user distribution for given duration for given subject

queryParams.name: subject
queryParams.validValues: As provided by subject list API
queryParams.multipleOccurrence: Not supported, only one will be picked up
queryParams.comment: Provides a filter for subject for which active users need to be listed

queryParams.name: activeDuration
queryParams.defaultValue: Would be governed by backend settings
queryParams.multipleOccurrence: Not supported, only one will be picked up
queryParams.comment: Hard coded duration value which will be considered for active user calculation

queryParams.name: offset
queryParams.multipleOccurrence: Not supported, only one will be picked up
queryParams.comment: defines offset from where to fetch the data

queryParams.name: limit
queryParams.multipleOccurrence: Not supported, only one will be picked up
queryParams.comment: total number of records that need to be returned. Note that there may be a cap on backend API and thus it may not exceed some pre defined value
